Announcement: This Friday, April 17th, will be the First Worldwide Virtual Julia Hackathon. Please check out and share this form so we can gather some data on participants and better understanding who will be attending: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYdr3T1i6jLee1ES2PfJ-MRadjlDAQQGTVx3vrquceLGCTyg/viewform?usp=sf_link Details coming soon! #JuliaLang
